thread.title: Four-star tight end joins UK 2017 class
thread.title_full: Four-star tight end joins UK 2017 class

author: courier-journal.com
title: Four-star tight end joins UK 2017 class
text:
LEXINGTON, Ky. â€“ Four-star tight end Charles Reeves has joined the Kentucky 2017 recruiting class, he announced on Twitter Thursday.
Reeves is rated as a four-star recruit by Scout.com, which also ranks him as the No. 6 tight end in the class of 2017. Rivals.com and 247Sports both rate Reeves as a three-star prospect.
The Steubenville High School junior is the sixth commitment in Kentuckyâ€™s 2017 class and the fourth pledge from Ohio in the class. He joins four-star running back Michael Warren, four-star defensive end James Hudson, three-star wide receiver Craig Yeast Jr. and three-star quarterbacks Mac Jones and Walker Wood in the class.
Reeves also held scholarship offers from Wisconsin, Michigan, Ohio and Purdue, according to 247Sports.
I'm gladly to say that I'm joining my brothers @russ_yeast03 @macjones2017 at the university of Kentucky #BBN ðŸ”µðŸ”µ
